column4: I'm trying to get my ATI driver working in 9.10 and I'm trying to install the linux-restricted packages
I tried using apt-get but it doesn't find "linux-restricted-packages" module
amd stopped supporting the radeon xpress 1250 so only option is the open source radeon driver
yes i know there are no proprietary drivers for that card you have to use the opensource drivers
my problem is the screen has a max resolution of 1680x1050 but I can only go to 1280 x 800
so do I need the correct driver?
in terminal type  xrandr  is   1680x1050   and option?
I read that it has native res of 1680.
i dont know. i have a radeon 9500 that amd stopped supporting. i couldnt get tv out to work with the  open source drivers. i ended up having to get a nvidia card
maybe try channel  #radeon  they may know
